- Built a lightweight operating system (docs, handoffs, QA checks) that cut recurring defects ~30% and improved stakeholder satisfaction.

If your remaining hire is still open: is this the kind of 1:1 evidence you need, and would a 10–15 minute screen be worthwhile to validate fit? If not, I completely understand and will focus elsewhere. Thank you for considering.
